name: avi
body:
I am a programmer from Hyderabad. I mostly code in Python but learning Swift these days. And I am available for hire!

---

Curious readers can find more content that I've generated by visiting the following hyperlinks:

* [GitHub](https://github.com/avinassh) - Some of the Open Source code I have written and contributed.
* [Blag](https://avi.im/blag) - Here I write about coding and things I am learning.
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/iavins) - I am mostly active on this thing.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
